title: Authors and Citation
text: Jenna Johnson. Author, maintainer. Anne Zheng. Author. Janelle Lennie. Contributor. Devin Pastoor. Author. Wes Cummings. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Johnson J, Zheng , Pastoor D, Cummings W (2025). ghqc.app: Create QC Checklists Github Issues. R package version 0.4.17, https://a2-ai.github.io/ghqc.app/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ghqc.app: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues},   author = {Jenna Johnson and Anne Zheng and Devin Pastoor and Wes Cummings},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.4.17},   url = {https://a2-ai.github.io/ghqc.app/}, }

what: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
title: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
text: goal ghqc ecosystem simplify, standardize, improve traceability QC process use shiny apps create GitHub Issues Milestones project. ghqc.app intended used ghqc package, aid setup launching shiny apps. ghqc.app package 3 main applications/functions: ghqc_assign_app: app helps author assign set files, corresponding checklist QCer, GitHub Milestone kick-QC review. ghqc_resolve_app: Throughout QC review, app helps author communicate resolution QC findings comparison file differences, hashes, commits. ghqc_record_app: app generates record compiles QC review occurred GitHub.

title: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
text: can install development version ghqc.app GitHub :

title: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
text: ghqc_assign_app provides interface assign one files QC form GitHub Issue(s) within GitHub Milestone, options assign repository collaborator QCer /generate checklist suggested review tasks QC. Issue created corresponds single file assigned reviewed QC. Issues organized Milestones designated user.

title: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
text: Input name create new Milestone select existing Milestone. Optional: creating new Milestone, input description. Optional: select one collaborators assigned perform QC. selected collaborator(s) assignee(s) explicitly assigned one selected files (Step 5 ). Select one files file tree. Click + signs expand directories file tree. Optional: select assignee selected file. Select checklist type selected file. Post Milestone clicking “Assign File(s) QC” bottom pane. time, user can: Click Preview file contents button selected file view contents. Click Preview checklist button selected file view items selected checklist.

title: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
text: ghqc_resolve_app allows user insert comment ghqc GitHub Issue displays changes version control information Issue’s corresponding file. default, comment displays original current commits hashes file. versions selected user. comment can optionally display file difference (“diff”) current previous versions. changes likely implementations QC feedback. use app, first initialize one Issues ghqc_assign_app().

title: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
text: Optional: filter set Issues within Milestone. Select Issue updated. Optional: provide contextualizing message changes made file (e.g. “Implemented QC feedback line 20”). Optional: insert file difference display comment, selecting “Show file difference”. displaying file difference, choose either: compare original version current version , compare previous version current version. Optional: preview comment posting Issue. Post comment Issue.

title: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
text: ghqc_record_app allows user generate QC Record one Milestones created ghqc_assign_app.

title: Create QC Checklists in Github Issues
text: Select one Milestones. optional include open closed Milestones unchecking “Closed Milestones ”. Optional: input name PDF. default name hyphenated combination GitHub repository name selected Milestone name(s). Optional: input directory generate PDF. default directory root R project. Optional: indicate report include Milestone Issue summary tables checking “Just tables”. Else, default setting generate Record contains summary tables front well detailed descriptions Issue including version control information, users, datetimes, events, actions, comments . Create PDF clicking “Generate QC Record” bottom pane.

title: Assign file(s) for QC — ghqc_assign_app
text: function provides interface assign one files QC form GitHub Issue(s) within GitHub Milestone, options assign repository collaborator QCer /generate checklist suggested review tasks QC.

title: Assign file(s) for QC — ghqc_assign_app
text: Starts Shiny app return value.

what: Generate a QC Record for one or more Milestones — ghqc_record_app
title: Generate a QC Record for one or more Milestones — ghqc_record_app
text: function allows user generate QC Record one Milestones created assign app.

title: Generate a QC Record for one or more Milestones — ghqc_record_app
Generate a QC Record for one or more Milestones — ghqc_record_app
text: Starts Shiny app return value.

what: Comment in an Issue to display file changes during QC — ghqc_resolve_app
title: Comment in an Issue to display file changes during QC — ghqc_resolve_app
text: function allows user insert comment ghqc GitHub Issue displays changes version control information Issue’s corresponding file. default, comment displays original current commits hashes file. versions selected user. comment can optionally display file difference (“diff”) current previous versions. changes likely implementations QC feedback.

title: Comment in an Issue to display file changes during QC — ghqc_resolve_app
Comment in an Issue to display file changes during QC — ghqc_resolve_app
text: Starts Shiny app return value.

set the repo that stores the ghqc info — ghqc_set_config_repo

title: ghqc.app 0.4.17
text: allows binary files assigned ghqc_assign_app() fixes bug file names spaces aren’t recognized

title: ghqc.app 0.4.16
text: fixes bug tables don’t hold position QC Records modifies wrapping Milestone Issue summary table columns fixes bug “—” isn’t escaped markdown fixes bug tables run page vertically

title: ghqc.app 0.4.15
text: fixes bug pre-app error checking unset upstream branch uncaught

title: ghqc.app 0.4.14
text: changes ghqc_resolve_app(): changes button bottom app “Post Comment” “Preview Comment” button doesn’t post comment fixes glue parsing bugs variables don’t exist case errors fixes commit log shell instead calling gert::git_log omits commits merges fixes commit log retrieve remote commits running app local branch interfere log fixes bug comments 65536 characters - large file diffs, link comparing “previous” “current” commits provided QCer reference

title: ghqc.app 0.4.13
text: changes ghqc_record_app(): changes references old terms “report” “record” new standardized term “QC Record” copies rmd file sourced files QC Record directory case error app fixes bullet point HTML syntax app warning modal fixes bug comment bodies markdown syntax (like -line code) didn’t render QC Record fixes bug checklist headers weren’t given line QC Record rendering

title: ghqc.app 0.4.12
text: fixes bug rlang %||% operator preventing use Associate Relevant Files feature

title: ghqc.app 0.4.11
text: allows metadata bullet parsing recognize * - characters.

title: ghqc.app 0.4.10
text: fixes error Associate Relevant Files modal pop-

title: ghqc.app 0.4.9
text: fixes HTTP 404 error caused attempts download images Issue comments ghqc_record_app() returns cases errors instead returning modal pop-tryCatchs, e$message replaced conditionMessage(e)

title: ghqc.app 0.4.8
text: increases max number commits gert::git_log() 9999 changes current commit calculated using first element get_commits_df$commit instead first commit git log HEAD

title: ghqc.app 0.4.7
text: fixes bug ghqc_resolve_app() get_commits_df failed error “argument length 0” case diverging branches getting entire git log.

title: ghqc.app 0.4.6
text: fixes bug ghqc_record_app() QC records unable generated due missing “qc type” metadata ghqc-generated issues since metadata simplification ghqc 0.4.0 re-formats summary tables QC Records given missing “qc type”” column removes get_author call ghqc_record replaces author retrieved Issue metadata Milestone summary table QC Records, adds spaces listed Issues Milestones removes author collaborators QC Data section QC Records redundant Issue metadata

title: ghqc.app 0.4.5
text: fixes bug ghqc_assign_app() “assigned QCer” isn’t option soon QCer selected QC file

title: ghqc.app 0.4.4
text: edits UI ghqc_assign_app() bold selected qc file paths edits UI ghqc_resolve_app() modal pop-clarify “Post Comment” “Cancel” options adds shinyvalidate marker ghqc_record_app() indicate required input least one milestone

title: ghqc.app 0.4.3
text: fixes bug QCer un-selectable relevant files selected QC file

title: ghqc.app 0.4.2
text: fixes bug QCers dropdown caused error selected files outside root directory

title: ghqc.app 0.4.1
text: fixes bug md5 hashes resolve comment metadata make hashes correct

title: ghqc.app 0.4.0
text: fixes large logo bug removes assignees section left panel isolates right panel changes language “Assignee” “QCer” removes “Preview Comment” button ghqc_resolve_app() instead displays comment preview modal pop-upon selecting “Post Comment”. adds “Associate Relevant Files” section modal pop-simplifies metadata ghqc Issues removing file history qc type ghqc remote ssh compatibility implemented stops apps error using advice slack overflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/70841568/-----terminate-r---every-shiny-app-run

title: ghqc.app 0.3.3
text: provides additional error handling resolve app case git branch isn’t present given Issue’s metadata section

title: ghqc.app 0.3.2
text: fixes bug resolve Issues created different branches haven’t fetched locally

title: ghqc.app 0.3.1
text: fixes bug parsing glue component

title: ghqc.app 0.3.0
text: “note” file within custom configuration repository now prepended_checklist_note within “options.yaml” checklist_display_name_var “options.yaml” provides option change name QC checklists referred .

title: ghqc.app 0.2.0
text: Inclusive 0.1.9, 0.1.10, 0.1.11 changes: Adding branch link file contents start QC Metadata section Issues created Assign app. Also added links file contents previous current commits metadata section resolve app comments. Adds “ghqc” label GitHub Issues created ghqc. Issues label, Milestones containing , viewable/selectable apps. change backward compatible Issues/Milestones created previous versions Clarifies language Warning Error modals three apps

title: ghqc.app 0.1.11
text: Adding branch link file contents start QC Metadata section Issues created Assign app. Also added links file contents previous current commits metadata section resolve app comments.

title: ghqc.app 0.1.10
text: Adds “ghqc” label GitHub Issues created ghqc. Issues label, Milestones containing , viewable/selectable apps. change backward compatible Issues/Milestones created previous versions

title: ghqc.app 0.1.9
text: Clarifies language Warning Error modals three apps

title: ghqc.app 0.1.8
text: Removes reset button record app modal users click closing milestones closed milestones exist (buggy viewer panel)

title: ghqc.app 0.1.7
text: Fixes bug rendered reports maximum height logos wasn’t set prevent overlapping header lines header text.

title: ghqc.app 0.1.6
text: Fixes bug record app previewing markdown files (bug solution 0.1.4)

title: ghqc.app 0.1.5
text: Fixes bug assign resolve apps - error checking catch remote changes directory checks git fetch first

title: ghqc.app 0.1.4
text: Fixes bug resolve app previewing markdown files

title: ghqc.app 0.1.3
text: Changes “Existing Milestones”” “Open Milestones” ghqc_assign_app() Existing Milestones dropdown menu

title: ghqc.app 0.1.2
text: Fixes bug record app warning modal pop-unclosed milestones/issues/checklist items: Milestone link wasn’t clickable Improves “closed milestones” modal pop-warning record app. Language change “recommended close milestones” adds reset link modal users click closing milestones.

title: ghqc.app 0.1.1
text: case someone sets standard gh environment variable GITHUB_API_URL, app checks URL matches actual set remote URL. function gets GITHUB_API_URL explicitly return value. Small grammar fix error message apps case checklists directory isn’t cloned info repo.

title: ghqc.app 0.0.0.9011
text: rename ghqc ghqc.app ghqc.launcher ghqc
